title: Stuck at reconnect screen
body: i cannot join a ranked game and now i will get 5 games 20 min ban because im stuck at reconnect button screen

replies.body: We saw some windows updates not too long ago, and I've noticed a lot of players having this issue right after the update and League patch. Usually this gets fixed up by [**configuring your firewall settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3) again, but also make sure your OS still has the [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) it needs to launch normally too.
Jao i ja sam taj problem imao
